subsections.title: AM, Single-Sideband
subsections.label: subsec:am-ssb
prompts: Explain the concept of Single Sideband (SSB) modulation, including its advantages over other forms of amplitude modulation.
Describe the differences between Upper Sideband (USB) and Lower Sideband (LSB) and their typical usage in different frequency bands.
Discuss the bandwidth characteristics of SSB signals and why they are more efficient for long-distance communication.
Compare the bandwidth of SSB signals with other modulation types, such as FM and AM.
